item.title: Retrieving Number of Lines of Google Document
item.description: Gists There are no prepared methods for retrieving the number of lines in the Google Document. So I thought this workaround. If the end of each line can be detected, the number of lines can be retrieved. So I tried to add the end markers of each line using OCR. At Google Documents, when a sentence is over the page width, the sentence automatically has the line break. But the line break has no \r\n or \n.
